title: 1am start to bilgewater event??
body:
I think its pretty insulting to start an event 1am local time just so Americans don't feel left out for a couple hours. After the patch delay and now this feels like NA-lite server.

I thought a benefit of having our own server was things would come out at reasonable times :/

P.S I wanna play Pyke ASAP

replies.body: Where did you find out he was coming out at 1am :O I'm trying to figure out when I get to play him {{sticker:sg-janna}}
